messages.door-locked-failed: You failed to lock the door
messages.door-unlocked-failed: You failed to unlock the door
messages.door-locked-failed: You failed to lock the door
messages.door-broken: You critically failed and broke the lock
messages.explosive-critical-failure: You failed miserably and triggered the device !
messages.trap-critical-failure: You critically failed and triggered the trap.
messages.trap-disarm-failed: You didn't manage to disarm the trap.

tutoCharIntro.start: Wow ! You've arrived ! At long last ! We need to find a way out of this hole !
tutoCharIntro.what-happened: Wait a moment, what's going on ?
tutoCharIntro.scram: Can't you see I'm busy ? Leave me alone
tutoCharIntro.what-happened-response:
I don't know dude ! I woke up in this place, it was dark, moist, and riddled with friggin rats !
I have a strong intuition that we must leave this place though... it's just as if some kind of omniscient puppeteer sent us here, but didn't bother to write us a backstory...
tutoCharIntro.who-are-you-response: Come to think of it... I don't really remember. My name is Helpful Copain, but I conveniently forgot everything else, so I won't bother you with a poorly written backstory.
tutoCharIntro.scram-response: Ooh, sorry big guy, seems like we have a tough one over here !
tutoCharIntro.provoke-further: You better watch your mouth, or else...
tutoCharIntro.provoke-further-response: Or else what ? You gonna kick my ass, is that it ? Hah ! I'd like to see you try !
tutoCharIntro.scram-excuses: Sorry, I didn't mean to be rude. I'd just rather do this on my own.
tutoCharIntro.scram-excuses-response: Alright, I get it... sorry I got carried away myself. Well, if you don't want my help, it can't be helped. Carry on then.
tutoCharIntro.scram-leave: Look, I don't have time for this... see you around, I guess. [Leave]
tutoCharIntro.ask-situation: So, what am I supposed to do ?
tutoCharIntro.aggressively-ask-situation: I don't actually care. Just tell me how to get out of this place.
tutoCharIntro.explain-situation: We need to leave this place. There are two potential ways I know of: on the eastern side, you have the regular entrance for the stable. It's locked though. There are other tunnels on the western side, but they're full of mutated rats. It might lead outside, but I wouldn't know... it's too dangerous to go alone.
tutoCharIntro.enough-details: I think I've got a good enough grasp of the situation. I'll be on my way then. [Leave]
tutoCharIntro.ask-help: You know, I might need some help leaving this cave. Do you mind coming with me ?
tutoCharIntro.provoke-details: So you didn't even try to explore any further ? You're so damn useless, I could slap you.
tutoCharIntro.accept-to-help: Sure, we'll be stronger if we stick together.
tutoCharIntro.decline-to-help: I don't know... you don't look like you can survive out there... I guess I'll just stay here and wait for someone stronger to show up.

parley.change-color: You're lacking in colors. Perhaps we could change that ?
parley.freaking-face: I've got a freaking face and all ! Isn't that cool enough ?!
parley.greetings: Hi there ! Gosh, it's been a while ! What's happening ?
parley.greetings-alt: Hi again. Is there something else ?
parley.no-mane: Looks like I was too lazy to give you a mane...
parley.rep1: You're damn right, "it's been a while" ! It's about time we get to work, isn't it ?
parley.rep2: Well, I've been pretty busy... but lately, I had an illumination of sorts, and I decided to see this thing to the end.
parley.rep3: Let's cut to the chase. Show me something cool

medicine-skill.in-combat: You can't use medicine during combat
medicine-skill.used-on: {{user}} used medicine on {{target}} and healed it for {{hp}} hit points.
